data.title: New apartment fully furnished
data.meta_description: Be my first tenant for a newly renovated apartment in first floor and are you willing to move in immediately? We are offering this fully furnished, quite, cleaned, and friendly neighbors. You only need your personal luggage and personal towels. The house is located at the entrance in Herchweiler, 15 minutes from Ramstein Airbase. The Apartment is approved and registered by the base housing office and homes.mil . This house consists of two apartments with a spacious garden + terrace, which can be used for barbecue parties. Enjoy the beautiful nature is located behind the house, just like the double parking spot. The apartment size is about 90 square meter (1 bedroom, 1 living room, kitchen, dining room with fireplace oven and bathroom. A new 20 square meters terrace with a beautiful view. The kitchen is fully equipped (two television, study table with LAN, refrigerator, washing machine, separate freezer, dishwasher, toaster, kettle, microwave, coffee maker, cutlery, tableware, cooking pot sets, pan set and glasses and cups). High-speed Internet is unlimited with Wi-Fi in all rooms and LAN in the living room. Satellite reception ASTRA with over 400 channels are available. Monthly rent: 1000 Euro + deposit at the beginning of the month  The additional costs vary up or down depending on consumption and is paid in advance at the beginning of the month. No self-contracts for water or electricity are required for the apartment. They have separate meters.  The property owner speaks English.  Sorry, no Pets!  Appliances Included: Kitchen with dishwasher, refrigerator, freezer, coffee maker, toaster, microwave, kettle, vacuum, electric oven stove – organic garbage , garbage - paper, garbage - residual waste, security cameras with recording for the parking spots, entrance and floor. Utilities Included: caretaker, chimney sweep, garbage removal, property tax and house-Insurances Not included: water, warm water, sewage, electric, heater and internet. For further information and more pictures please feel free to contact us per e-mail:  mariapalenga@gmail.com +4917643200351 or WhatsApp.
data.text:
Be my first tenant for a newly renovated apartment in first floor and are you willing to move in immediately?

We are offering this fully furnished, quite, cleaned, and friendly neighbors. You only need your personal luggage and personal towels.

The house is located at the entrance in Herchweiler, 15 minutes from Ramstein Airbase.

The Apartment is approved and registered by the base housing office and homes.mil .

This house consists of two apartments with a spacious garden + terrace, which can be used for barbecue parties. Enjoy the beautiful nature is located behind the house, just like the double parking spot. The apartment size is about 90 square meter (1 bedroom, 1 living room, kitchen, dining room with fireplace oven and bathroom. A new 20 square meters terrace with a beautiful view. The kitchen is fully equipped (two television, study table with LAN, refrigerator, washing machine, separate freezer, dishwasher, toaster, kettle, microwave, coffee maker, cutlery, tableware, cooking pot sets, pan set and glasses and cups).

High-speed Internet is unlimited with Wi-Fi in all rooms and LAN in the living room. Satellite reception ASTRA with over 400 channels are available.

Monthly rent: 1000 Euro + deposit at the beginning of the month

The additional costs vary up or down depending on consumption and is paid in advance at the beginning of the month. No self-contracts for water or electricity are required for the apartment. They have separate meters.

The property owner speaks English.

Sorry, no Pets!

Appliances Included: Kitchen with dishwasher, refrigerator, freezer, coffee maker, toaster, microwave, kettle, vacuum, electric oven stove – organic garbage , garbage - paper, garbage - residual waste, security cameras with recording for the parking spots, entrance and floor.

Utilities Included: caretaker, chimney sweep, garbage removal, property tax and house-Insurances

Not included: water, warm water, sewage, electric, heater and internet.

For further information and more pictures please feel free to contact us

per e-mail:

mariapalenga@gmail.com

+4917643200351 or WhatsApp.
